mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jjim(jjimno, memberno, galleryno, rdate) VALUES(jjim_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{galleryno}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT t.jjimno, c.galleryno, c.title, c.thumb1, t.memberno, t.rdate FROM gallery c, jjim t WHERE (c.galleryno = t.galleryno) AND t.memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY jjimno DESC
